item.title: Bongo Fortress
item.description: The DK Bongos are special controllers designed for Donkey Konga and Donkey Kong Jungle Beat. Luckily for us, they also can be used as a standard controller on the PC.
item.content:encoded:
The DK Bongos are special controllers designed for Donkey Konga and Donkey Kong Jungle Beat. Luckily for us, they also can be used as a standard controller on the PC.

For the morbidly curious, here is how to set them up:

  1. Plug your DK Bongos into a GameCube USB Adapter.
  2. Plug the GameCube USB Adapter into the PC.
  3. Download and launch the latest version of Zadig.
  4. Select Options > List All Devices.
  5. Select WUP-028
  6. Click on Install Driver.
  7. Download and launch the latest version of JoyToKey.
  8. Under Joystick 2, bind Buttons 1-4 and 10 to whatever keys you want.
  9. Launch your game and have a terrible time.

This is far from the optimal way to play games, especially Team Fortress 2.

But if you insist on trying it with TF2, be sure to enter +forward into console.
